titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Reyfham in the countie of Norff. the 22. of September, an. Do. 1588 And eftsoones at request published by R.H. minister of Gods worde.
titleStmt.author: Humpston, Robert, d. 1606.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Wolfe for Edward Aggas,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
